name: NGJ2023 - Minotaur Defense - Team Ancient Beef
name_original: NGJ2023 - Minotaur Defense - Team Ancient Beef
description:
Nordic Gamejam 2023 - Team Ancient Beef

Get ready for an intense, action-packed rogue-like game for two players!

Choose your role as either The Game Master (Player 1) or Midas, The Minotaur (Player 2). 

As The Game Master, your mission is to prevent Midas from reaching the end of the labyrinth by unleashing vile bacteria and setting up challenging obstacles around the world. Meanwhile, Midas must fight to survive and exterminate all the obstacles and enemies that The Game Master throws at him. But be warned, victory comes at a price, and both players must carefully manage their resources to progress through the levels and emerge victorious. Are you ready to take on the challenge and emerge as the ultimate champion of the space labyrinths?

Note: Gamermaster uses Keyboard - Minotaur uses a Controller

Known Errors (Ran out of time sorry♥) The Gamemaster sometimes have trouble selecting spaawn points, bacteria lvl2 can't die and Trap Wall doesnt do anything :D (Missing collider)

Created by Oliver Jørgensen, Pia Hansen, Casper Knudsen, Emil Knudsen og Katrine Gydelund Lemb
